name: The Great Sea Gander
description:
A duck gets lost in the abyss of the ocean, and will have to use echolocation to get out.

-Controls-

Arrow keys to move

Left Shift to quack

To get the zoom right set the webpage's zoom to 80%

-Credits-

Art Axolotl made most of the art:🎃https://www.instagram.com/art_axolotl/

Music from bensound:https://www.bensound.com/

-Other-
Unity webgl is the glitchiest thing ever.
